note:
Live in South Bristol. Right Hemiplegia Cerebral Palsy, which doesn't stop or define me.

Proud rejoiner of UK within the EU, detest the stupidity of Brexit, unashamedly woke !

name: Likes
value: Most Sports, especially Speedway, and Ice Hockey. Read a fair bit, mostly books related to sports, biographies etc. Keen follower of technology, especially mobile phones.

name: Dislikes
value: The idiocy of brexit, the tory party, right wingers, especially the far right
